name: layered-approach
description: src    ├──server.js    ├──.env           dotenv configuration    ├──app          ├── index.js                   app entry point          ├── /api-docs                  api documnentation (swagger/openApi)          ├── /api-routes                api routes                   ├── /config                    config settings, env variables                ├──config.js             convict configuration                ├──development.json      development configuration values                   ├── /controllers               controller layer          ├── /loaders                   loaders for startup modules          ├── /services                  service layer: business logic          ├── /models                    data access layer: database models          ├── /scripts                   miscellaneous NPM scripts          ├── /subscribers               async event handlers          └── /test                      test suites
